Package oop

Class MedicineStock

java.lang.Object
oop.MedicineStock
public class MedicineStock extends Object
The MedicineStock class represents a medicine item in a pharmacy or hospital stock system. It keeps track of essential information such as the medicine's name, stock quantity, price, and low stock level. This class also allows updating the stock and managing stock levels, including the rolling stock which reflects stock movements.

The MedicineStock class provides methods to get and set the details of the medicine, including stock quantity, price, and low stock threshold.

Since:
2024-11-09

    • MedicineStock

      public MedicineStock(String name, int stock, int lowStockLevel, int price)
      Constructs a new MedicineStock instance with the specified name, stock quantity, low stock level, and price.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the medicine.
      stock - The current stock of the medicine.
      lowStockLevel - The low stock level that triggers a warning.
      price - The price of the medicine.
